types.name: Root
types.description: Type representing the root of the Slack driver.

actions.name: configure
actions.description: Sets up the Slack API token for enabling interactions with Slack.

actions.name: endpoint
actions.description: Handles incoming HTTP requests to the Slack driver.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current operational status of the Slack driver.

fields.name: channels
fields.description: A collection of Slack channels that can be interacted with.

fields.name: users
fields.description: A collection of Slack users available for messaging and interactions.

fields.name: parse
fields.description: A list of custom parsing rules for Slack message processing.

fields.name: tests
fields.description: A suite of tests to verify the Slack driver's functionality and integration.

types.name: ChannelCollection

fields.name: one
fields.description: Fetches a specific Slack channel by its unique identifier.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Retrieves a paginated list of Slack channels.

actions.name: create
actions.description: Creates a new Slack channel with specified name and privacy settings.

types.description: Collection of channels in the Slack workspace.

types.name: ChannelPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: Channels present on the current page.

fields.name: next
fields.description: Link to the next set of channels in the pagination sequence.

types.description: Page of channels in the Slack workspace.

types.name: Channel

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the channel within the Slack workspace.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the channel within the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_channel
fields.description: Indicates whether the channel is a public channel in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_group
fields.description: Indicates whether the channel is a private group in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_im
fields.description: Indicates whether the channel is a direct message (IM) channel in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_mpim
fields.description: Indicates whether the channel is a multi-party IM (MPIM) channel in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_private
fields.description: Indicates whether the channel is a private channel in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: created
fields.description: Timestamp of when the channel was created.

fields.name: is_archived
fields.description: Indicates if the channel has been archived.

fields.name: is_general
fields.description: Denotes if the channel is the general channel for the workspace.

fields.name: unlinked
fields.description: Timestamp of when the channel was unlinked.

fields.name: is_shared
fields.description: Indicates if the channel is shared with other workspaces.

fields.name: is_org_shared
fields.description: Indicates if the channel is shared across the organization.

fields.name: is_pending_ext_shared
fields.description: Indicates if there is a pending external share of the channel.

fields.name: is_read_only
fields.description: Indicates if the channel is read-only.

fields.name: is_thread_only
fields.description: Indicates if the channel is thread-only.

fields.name: is_member
fields.description: Indicates if the driver is a member of the channel.

fields.name: is_ext_shared
fields.description: Indicates if the channel is externally shared.

fields.name: is_non_threadable
fields.description: Indicates if the channel does not support threading.

fields.name: shared_team_ids
fields.description: List of team IDs with which the channel is shared.

fields.name: pending_connected_team_ids
fields.description: List of team IDs that have a pending connection to the channel.

fields.name: previous_names
fields.description: List of previous names the channel has had.

actions.name: invite

params.name: users
params.description: A comma separated list of user IDs. Up to 30 users may be listed.

actions.description: Invites users to a Slack channel using their user IDs.

actions.name: sendMessage
actions.description: Sends a message to the Slack channel with optional attachments and blocks.

actions.name: leave
actions.description: Exits the Slack channel, removing the driver from members.

events.name: onSlashCommand
events.description: Slash command in the Membrane Slack Driver.

events.name: onEvent
events.description: Webhook event in the Membrane Slack Driver.

types.description: Representation of a Slack channel.

types.name: UserCollection

fields.name: one
fields.description: Retrieves a single user from the Slack workspace by their unique ID.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Provides a paginated list of users from the Slack workspace.

types.description: Collection of users in the Slack workspace.

types.name: UserPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of users included in the current page.

fields.name: next
fields.description: Reference to the next page of users for continued pagination.

types.description: Page of users in the Slack workspace.

types.name: User

fields.name: team_id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the Slack team to which the user belongs.

fields.name: deleted
fields.description: Indicates whether the user has been deleted from the Slack workspace.

fields.name: color
fields.description: The user's associated color in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: real_name
fields.description: The real name of the user as provided in their Slack profile.

fields.name: tz
fields.description: The time zone identifier for the user's location.

fields.name: tz_label
fields.description: The label of the user's time zone.

fields.name: tz_offset
fields.description: The time zone offset in seconds for the user's location.

fields.name: is_admin
fields.description: Indicates if the user has admin privileges in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_owner
fields.description: Indicates if the user is an owner of the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_primary_owner
fields.description: Indicates if the user is the primary owner of the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_restricted
fields.description: Indicates if the user has restricted access in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_ultra_restricted
fields.description: Indicates if the user has ultra-restricted access in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_bot
fields.description: Denotes if the user is a bot in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: is_app_user
fields.description: Indicates if the user is an app user in the Slack workspace.

fields.name: updated
fields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the user's profile.

fields.name: has_2fa
fields.description: Indicates if the user has two-factor authentication enabled.

fields.name: profile
fields.description: Profile in the Membrane Slack Driver.

actions.name: sendMessage
actions.description: Sends a direct message to a Slack user with optional formatting.

types.description: Representation of a Slack user.

types.name: Profile
types.description: Profile information of a Slack user.

types.name: MemberCollection
types.description: Collection of members in a Slack channel.

types.name: MemberPage
types.description: Page of members in a Slack channel.

types.name: MessageCollection
types.description: Collection of messages in a Slack channel.

types.name: MessagePage
types.description: Page of messages in a Slack channel.

types.name: Message
types.description: Representation of a message in a Slack channel.

types.name: BotProfile
types.description: Profile information of a Slack bot.

types.name: Reaction

fields.name: name
fields.description: Reaction name in the Membrane Slack Driver.

fields.name: count
fields.description: Number of reactions in the Membrane Slack Driver.

fields.name: users
fields.description: List of users who reacted in the Membrane Slack Driver.

types.description: Representation of a reaction to a message in a Slack channel.

types.name: Topic

fields.name: value
fields.description: Topic value in the Membrane Slack Driver.

fields.name: creator
fields.description: Creator of the topic in the Membrane Slack Driver.

fields.name: last_set
fields.description: Timestamp of the last set topic in the Membrane Slack Driver.

types.description: Representation of a topic in a Slack channel.

types.name: SlashCommand

fields.name: url
fields.description: URL associated with the slash command in the Membrane Slack Driver.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Text associated with the slash command in the Membrane Slack Driver.

types.description: Representation of a slash command in a Slack channel.

types.name: WebhookEvent
types.description: Representation of a webhook event in a Slack channel.

types.name: Member
types.description: Representation of a member in a Slack channel.

types.name: Tests
types.description: Representation of a test case for the Slack driver.
